actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To extend the deadlines under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of New York.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to extend, for a designated period, the time required for specified licensees to commence construction of a certain small hydroelectric generation facility in Rome, New York.

titles.title: To extend the deadlines under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of New York.
